plot: A recycler collects bodies and clothes to make a ritual where the dead eat themselves symbolically in a soup of obituaries.
title: Júbilo Inmortal
plot_es: A recycler collects bodies and clothes to make a ritual where the dead eat themselves symbolically in a soup of obituaries.
plot_en: A recycler collects bodies and clothes to make a ritual where the dead eat themselves symbolically in a soup of obituaries.
